Dataset.Name: C-REACT (Contextualized Race and Ethnicity Annotations for Clinical Text)
Dataset.Description: 17,281 sentences from MIMIC-III discharge summaries were manually annotated for race and ethnicity indicators and sentence-level RE category labels by both non-clinicians and clinicians. Sentences span across 12,000 patients and 13,507 notes.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Two-stage annotation: (1) span-level annotations for RE indicators (country, language, race, ethnicity), and (2) sentence-level RE category assignments (e.g., Black/AA, Asian, white, Hispanic/Latino) based on federal guidelines. Non-clinicians handled indicator spans, clinicians handled sentence-level RE labels. Inter-annotator agreement for span annotations was macro F1 > 0.85. RE category labels were determined via majority vote across annotators.
